articles.title: Record-Breaking Stellar Black Hole Found Lurking Close to Earth - ScienceAlert
articles.description: You never really know what you might find hiding in your own backyard, especially if those things are particularly adept at escaping detection.

articles.title: Winchcombe meteorite's history revealed by fresh analysis - BBC.com
articles.description: Researchers say the Winchcombe meteorite is "a remarkable piece of space history".
